Sentencas: The effect of CuO addition on the microstructure and ionic conductivity of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) were investigated.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Undoped and 1 mol%, 1.5 mol%, 2 mol%, 2.5 mol% and 3 mol% CuO-doped 8YSZ bulks were prepared by sol-gel synthesis, cold pressing forming, and high-temperature sintering.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The micro-structure, phase composition, and ionic conductivity of the samples were characterized in detail to determine whether it could be used as alternative electrolyte material for the intermediate and low temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The results reveal that all samples present cubic zirconia.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: With increasing the CuO-doping content, the lattice parameter of the samples decreases, while the relative density of the samples increases from 66 to 85%, and the mean grain size increases from 0.90 to 2.63 mu m.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Furthermore, it is found that 2 mol% CuO doped 8YSZ possesses the minimum activation energy of 0.945 eV and the maximum AC ionic conductivity of 5.75 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia
Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The change in the ionic conductivity with the CuO-doping content is closely related to microstructural evolution and defect association in the materials.
Titulo: Evolutions in the microstructure and ionic conductivity of CuO-doped yttria-stabilized zirconia
